title: You and Morvain head out.
description: Morvain leads you through the human settlements, showing how small gestures influence others.
Unlike his demeanor at the castle, he charismatically speaks with a merchant.
The merchant hands him some free goods, nodding with respect.

outcomeText: You emulate Morvain's words and gestures carefully.
The human smiles, intrigued by your presence.
You convince the human to visit your supposed "mansion".
You continue to watch and observe silently.
The conversation starts to get dull, and the merchant slowly parts away.
You lose some faith in Morvain.
